Package brickdestroy.model

package brickdestroy.model
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    brickdestroy
     
    brickdestroy.controller
     
    brickdestroy.view
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Ball
    An abstract Ball class that is responsible to create the ball face and set the position, speed, colour of the ball.
    BallFactory
    A ball factory that return a ball object based on the ball type.
    Brick
    An abstract brick class that is responsible to make brick face, to check the brick broken status, to repair the brick, to find and set impact and to set the color of the brick.
    BrickFactory
    A brick factory that returns a brick object based on the brick type.
    CementBrick
    A cement brick class that inherits abstract brick class.
    ClayBrick
    A clay brick class that inherits from the abstract brick class.
    Crack
    A crack class that is responsible to make a crack on the cement brick.
    Level
    A level class that is responsible to make levels of games, to switch to next level and to check whether there is any more levels left.
    MagicBrick
    A magic brick class that inherits from the abstract brick class.
    Player
    A player class that is responsible to move left/right to catch the ball.
    RubberBall
    A rubber ball class that inherits from the abstract ball class.
    SteelBrick
    A steel brick class that inherits from the abstract brick class.
    Wall
    A wall class that is responsible to set and get the state of the level, player, ball and bricks.
